property.name: Traits
property.value: Hobbit. Ring-bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Planning Action: Exhaust The One Ring to add 1 resource to a hero’s pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dunedain. Gondor. Noble. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first player gains control of Aragorn. Action: Spend 1 resource from Aragorn’s pool to ready Aragorn. (Limit once per phase.) If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Noble. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Eomer commits to the quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to declare him as an attacker (and resolve his attack) against an enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are engaged with an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, the first Hobbit ally you play each round does not require a resource match. Response: After a Hobbit ally enters play, it gets +2 Û until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Rosie Cotton to choose a Hobbit hero and an attribute (Ò, Û, or Ú). Add Rosie Cotton’s printed Ò to that hero’s chosen attribute until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 1 resource from a Rohan hero’s pool to put Elfhelm into play from your hand under your control. At the end of the phase, discard Elfhelm if he is still in play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Noldor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Elrohir is in play, Elladan gets +2 Û. Response: After you optionally engage an Orc enemy, ready Elladan.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Noldor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Elladan is in play, Elrohir gets +2 Ú. Response: After you optionally engage an Orc enemy, ready Elrohir.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Until the end of the phase, each Noble hero gets +1 Ò and does not exhaust to commit to the quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you engage an enemy, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Hobbit ally and put it into play (search your entire deck instead if that enemy’s engagement cost is higher than your threat). Shuffle your deck. At the end of the round, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted. Response: After attached hero is declared as an attacker, exhaust Guthwinë to give that hero +2 Û for this attack. If this attack destroys an enemy, return a Rohan ally from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 2 copies of Friend of Friends in play. While another hero has Friend of Friends attached, attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, +1 Ú and +1 hit point.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to the Ring-bearer. Limit 1 per hero. While an Orc is making an engagement check with you, it gets +5 engagement cost. Response: After an Orc enemy engages you, discard Orc Disguise. Until the end of the round, that enemy cannot attack you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached hero gains the Ring-bearer trait and the ☺ sphere. You cannot lose control of the first player token. Action: Exhaust The One Ring and raise your threat by 1 to choose an Orc enemy. Until the end of the phase, that enemy gets -X $, where X is the attached hero’s Ò.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cirith Ungol.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. The players cannot travel here unless there is at least 18 progress on stage 2B. Travel: Add Shagrat to the staging area to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cirith Ungol.

property.name: Text
property.value: Echoing Passage gets +1 $ for each enemy in the staging area. While Echoing Passage is the active location, each enemy gets +2 Ú.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cirith Ungol.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Bloodied Courtyard is the active location, it gains: “Forced: After an enemy enters the staging area, deal 1 damage to it.” Travel: Raise each player’s threat by 1 to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cirith Ungol.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Winding Stairs is the active location, each enemy in the staging area gets +10 engagement cost. Travel: Each player exhausts a character he controls to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cirith Ungol.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After the players travel to Torch-lit Hall, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. If there is a copy of that enemy in the staging area, discard that copy as well. If there is not, add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have non-boon attachments. Cannot take non-combat damage. Allies cannot attack or defend against Shagrat. Forced: After progress is placed on the quest, Shagrat gets -X engagement cost until the end of the round. X is the amount of progress just placed.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have attachments. Forced: After Gorbag engages you, it makes an immediate attack against you.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wounded Uruk enters play with 2 damage on it. Forced: After Wounded Uruk engages you, it gets +2 Û until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damage on it.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, each enemy gets +1 $ for each damage on it. If there are no enemies in the staging area, Orcish Howls gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you are engaged with another enemy, resolve this attack against that enemy.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. The players cannot travel here. The Black Gate gets +1 $ for each resource on it. Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 resource here and raise each player’s threat by 1.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. X is the number of characters controlled by the player with the most characters. While Towers of the Teeth is the active location, players cannot play allies.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: While Beleaguered Hills is the active location, reduce the total $ in the staging area by X, where X is the total $ of each engaged enemy. Forced: After Beleaguered Hills becomes the active location, each player engages a non-unique enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: While Waste of Dagorlad is the active location, treat the text box of each ally as if it were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Slopes of Cirith Gorgor leaves play, the first player shuffles the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discards cards from the top until an enemy is discarded. Then, he puts that enemy into play engaged with him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Reeking Moat becomes the active location, choose a non-unique, non-Nazgul enemy in the staging area and place it facedown under Reeking Moat. Forced: When Reeking Moat leaves play, put each enemy under it into play engaged with the first player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: While Wall of Morannon is the active location, each enemy and location in the staging area is immune to player card effects. Forced: After Wall of Morannon becomes the active location, return each engaged enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Cannot leave the staging area. Forced: After a player cancels a ‘when revealed’ effect, The Mouth of Sauron makes an immediate attack against that player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have non-Morgul attachments. Forced: After Nazgul of Mordor attacks, either raise your threat by 4, or return Nazgul of Mordor to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have attachments. Forced: After Gorgoroth Hill-troll attacks and destroys a character, the defending player discards a random card from his hand and raises his threat by that card’s printed cost.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Archery 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to a questing character you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player then makes an attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Choose a questing character you control and remove it from the quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either search the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for a Nazgul enemy and add it to the staging area, or attach Hell-hawk to a Nazgul enemy in play. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: “Limit 1 per enemy. Attached enemy gets +2 $, +2 Û, +2 Ú and is immune to player card effects.”)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1 for each character you control, or discard the highest cost ally you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each players assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of resources on The Black Gate.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each resource on The Black Gate.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The Mouth of Sauron makes an immediate attack against you. If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by 4.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if it is The Mouth of Sauron).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a questing character he controls. Until the end of the phase, each damaged character gets -1 Ò and cannot be healed.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Choose a non-unique enemy in the staging area. Engage it and deal it a shadow card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Type
property.value: Objective Ally

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Eagle.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ranged. Sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player must choose: either take control of Gwaihir, or spend 1 ☺ resource and discard Gwaihir to discard a non-unique enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: This attack deals no damage.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Players do not raise their threat at the end of the refresh phase. Forced: At the end of the round, each player raises his threat by 1 for each non-☺ character he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. X is the tens digit of the first player’s threat dial. The players cannot travel here unless there is at least 20 progress on stage 3B. Travel: Each player makes a Fortitude test. If a player fails this test, he raises his threat by 9.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: While Orc-hold is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on other locations in the staging area. Forced: After Orc-hold becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the top until an Orc enemy is discarded. Put that enemy into play engaged with the first player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Mordor Road gets +1 $ for each ally controlled by the player who controls the most allies. Forced: After Mordor Road becomes the active location, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: If a player has failed a Fortitude test this round, Plain of Gorgoroth gets +2 $. Travel: The first player makes a Fortitude test to travel here. If this test is unsuccessful, raise each player’s threat by 4.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: While Brake of Thorns is in the staging area, add (S) to each Fortitude test. Forced: After Brake of Thorns becomes the active location, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the tens digit of his threat dial.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: While Old Water-course is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Old Water-course is explored, reduce each player’s threat by 5.” Travel: Each player must exhaust a hero he controls to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Surge. Immune to non-☺ player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gollum engages the first player. Forced: When Gollum is discarded during a Fortitude test, put him into play engaged with the first player. Then, choose an encounter card discarded for this test and ignore its (S) icons.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have non-Morgul attachments. While Ringwraith of Sauron is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a player fails a Fortitude test, Ringwraith of Sauron engages that player and makes an immediate attack.”

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Orc Captain engages you, make a Fortitude test. If you fail this test, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Big Uruk engages you, either raise your threat by 4, or Big Uruk makes an immediate attack against you.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each ally you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Snaga.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either raise your threat by 1 for each ally you control, or discard an ally you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Gollum makes an immediate attack against the first player. If Gollum is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Gollum and put him into play engaged with the first player.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Gollum, he makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Make a Fortitude test. If The One Ring is exhausted, add (SS) to the test. If you fail this test, raise your threat by 10.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you failed a Fortitude test this round).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player makes a Fortitude test. If you fail this test, deal 1 damage to each character you control. Until the end of the round, treat the text box of each damaged character as if it were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you failed a Fortitude test this round, this attack is considered undefended.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the hero with the most attachments and exhaust that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot commit to Fortitude tests. Forced: After you fail a Fortitude test, exhaust attached hero and discard each non-objective attachment on it.”)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Orcs of Mordor

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Orc of Mordor engages you, exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Orcs of Mordor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Snaga.

property.name: Text
property.value: Archery 2. Forced: After Snaga Archer engages you, deal 2 damage to a character you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character is damaged).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Orcs of Mordor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Uruk Soldier engages you, raise your threat by 2.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deep Shadows

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player must choose: Either exhaust The One Ring and reveal an encounter card, or discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded and put it into play engaged with him.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deep Shadows

property.name: Text
property.value: Doomed 2. When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard your hand (with at least 3 cards in it), or he reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deep Shadows

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: Either discard a questing character you control, or raise your threat by 1 for each questing character you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Epic Multiplayer Mode

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player exhausts a character he controls. If The Eye of Sauron is in the staging area, characters cannot be readied by player card effects this round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If The Eye of Sauron is in the staging area, attacking enemy gets +2 Û and returns to the staging area after this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Encounter Set: Artifact. Item. Ring. Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer. Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero. If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Shagrat aside, out of play. Add The Two Watchers (location side faceup) and Topmost Chamber to the staging area. The first player loses control of the Ring-bearer, places it faceup under Topmost Chamber as a guarded objective. Then, the first player attaches Last of the Company to a hero he controls and attaches The One Ring to that hero.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Each non-unique location gets -1 $ and cannot leave the staging area. While The Two Watchers is in the staging area (enemy side faceup), it is considered to be engaged with each player. This stage cannot be defeated while The Two Watchers is in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards until X enemies are discarded, where X is the number of players in the game. Add each enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. If there is a copy of that enemy in the staging area, discard that copy as well. If there is not, add the discarded enemy to the staging area. This stage cannot be defeated unless Topmost Chamber is in the victory display. When the Ring-bearer is free of encounters, the first player gains control of it.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Last of the Company to the victory display. Attach The One Ring to the Ring-bearer and exhaust the Ring-bearer. The first player moves The Two Watchers from the victory display to the staging area (location side faceup). Each other player reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: The players cannot travel to The Two Watchers unless there is at least 12 progress on this stage. While The Two Watchers is in the staging area (enemy side faceup), it gets +3 [Threat] and +3 [Defense] and is considered to be engaged with each player. This stage cannot be defeated while The Two Watchers is in play. If this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player may change heroes he controls without incurring the +1 threat penalty. Attach A Heavy Burden to the hero with Last of the Company attached. Each player chooses an Item boon (excluding Anduril) from the campaign pool and sets it aside, out of play. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and flip this card over: HD, TRtI, TPotGC

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When the players advance to stage 3A, attach A Heavy Burden to the Ring-bearer. Attach each set aside Item boon to Shagrat as a guarded objective. When Shagrat is defeated, return each guarded boon to its owner's hand. Resolution: If Shagrat is in play, remove each Item boon attached to it from the campaign pool. (The players have lost those boons.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. X is twice the stage number of the main quest. Forced: After the players travel here, flip The Two Watchers to its enemy side and move it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Tower of Cirith Ungol

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Cannot be optionally engaged. Forced: When The Two Watchers deals any amount of damage, cancel the damage and raise the defending player’s threat by X instead. X is the amount of damage just canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add The Black Gate and The Mouth of Sauron to the staging area. Set Gwaihir aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. When Revealed: In player order, each player places the top card of his deck faceup in front of him until there are a total of 4 faceup player cards between the players. Place the top 4 cards of the encounter deck faceup. Starting with the highest cost player card, pair each player card with the highest threat encounter card remaining until there are 4 pairs. For each pair, the first player must choose: either discard both cards in that pair, or reveal the encounter card to play the player card at no cost.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different Orc, Troll, or Nazgul enemy to the staging area. Shuffle Gwaihir into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. During the staging step, the first player does not reveal an encounter card as normal. Instead, he reveals 1 encounter card for each resource on The Black Gate. Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, discard the active location. This stage cannot be defeated. Each round the players survive gives the Ring-bearer more time to fulfill the quest to Mount Doom.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player may change heroes he controls without incurring the +1 threat penalty. The first player may raise each player’s threat by 1 to search his deck for Anduril and add it to his hand. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck: ASotP, FtF, TRGS, TPofM, SL

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Black Gate Opens

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Record the number of resource tokens on The Black Gate in the notes section of the campaign log. If a Wraith on Wings is in the victory display, remove that copy from the campaign pool. If the first player controls Gwaihir, add him to the campaign pool. The players have earned that boon. If a hero is in its controller's discard pile, do not add that hero's name to the list of fallen heroes.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Mount Doom and The Tower of Barad-dur to the staging area. Make Brake of Thorns the active location. Each player searches the encounter deck for a different location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. This stage gets +4 quest points for each player. The first treachery revealed each quest phase is immune to player card effects and gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for Mordor Road and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and travel to Mordor Road.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. Forced: After placing progress here from questing successfully, each player makes a fortitude test. If a player passes this test, he places a resource here. If a player fails this test, he discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded and puts that enemy into play engaged with him. At the end of the quest phase, if the number of resources here is equal to or greater than the number of players, advance to stage 3A.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until X locations are discarded, where X is the number of players in the game. Add each location discarded this way to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. The first treachery revealed each quest phase is immune to player card effects and gains surge. Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, the first player makes a Fortitude test. If the first player fails this test, no more than 5 progress can be placed here this round. This stage cannot be defeated unless Mount Doom is the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until X enemies are discarded, where X is the number of players. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Dire. Allies cannot enter play and ‘when revealed’ effects cannot be canceled. Forced: When Mount Doom is explored, the first player makes a Fortitude test. Discard 1 extra encounter card for each player. If the first player fails this test, the Ring-bearer claims The One Ring for himself and the players lose the game. If the test is successful, the Ring-bearer completes his quest and the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player may change heroes he controls without incurring the +1 threat penalty. Place X resource tokens on this card, where X is the number or resource tokens on The Black Gate, as recorded in the campaign log. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck: HD, TRtI, TPotGC Forced: At the end of the round, remove 1 resource token from this card. Then, if there are no resource tokens here, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Mount Doom

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: The first player must choose: - Keep The One Ring card and succumb to the power of Sauron. Then, the players lose the campaign. - Destroy The One Ring card and defeat the power of Sauron. Then, the players win the campaign.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Epic Multiplayer Mode

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Create two separate staging areas: one for The Black Gate Opens and one for Mount Doom. Divide the players into 2 teams, one for each scenario. No more than 4 players can be assigned to each scenario and the number of players assigned to Mount Doom cannot be more than the number assigned to The Black Gate Opens. Shuffle 1 copy of In Darkness Bind Them into each encounter deck. Place The Eye of Sauron in the Mount Doom staging area with its corresponding side faceup. Flip this card over and set it next to the Mount Doom quest deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Epic Multiplayer Mode

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore the Forced effect on the Mount Doom campaign card if it is in play. Forced: At the end of the round, the first player chooses a scenario (The Black Gate Opens or Mount Doom). Each player at the chosen scenario draws 1 card. Each player at the other scenario reduces his threat by 3. Then, the player who controls the Gwaihir objective-ally may give control of it to another player (at either scenario). At the end of the round, if the last player at either scenario is defeated, both teams lose the game. If the Mount Doom scenario is defeated, both teams win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Epic Multiplayer Mode

property.name: Text
property.value: Add (S) to each Fortitude test. Forced: At the end of the round, flip The Eye of Sauron, then move it and each Nazgul enemy in the staging area to The Black Gate Opens staging area. The first player may raise each player’s threat by 3 to cancel this effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Epic Multiplayer Mode

property.name: Text
property.value: Each enemy in the staging area gets +1 $ and -10 engagement cost. Forced: At the end of the round, flip The Eye of Sauron, then move it and each Nazgul enemy in the staging area to the Mount Doom staging area. The first player may raise each player’s threat by 3 to cancel this effect.
